document.masterDocTitle: Survey of the semiaquatic bugs (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Gerromorpha) from Alagoas and Sergipe, Northeast Brazil

subSubSection.paragraph: Geographical distribution: Argentina ( Harris & Drake 1941 ), Belize ( Spangler 1990 ), Bonaire ( Cobben 1960 ), Brazil ( Jaczewski 1928b ), Canada ( Chagnon & Fournier 1948 ), Colombia ( Alvarez & Roldán-Pérez 1983 ), Costa Rica ( Spangler 1990 ), Cuba ( Nieser 1977 ), Curaçao ( Cobben 1960 ), Dominican Republic ( Spangler 1990 ), Galápagos Islands ( Peck 2001 ), Grenada ( Uhler 1894a ), Hawaiian Islands ( Gagné & Howarth 1975 ), Jamaica ( Usinger 1968 ), Martinique ( De Kort-Gommers & Nieser 1969 ), Mexico ( Andersen & Polhemus 1980 ), Panama ( Harris & Drake 1941 ), Puerto Rico ( Harris & Drake 1941 ), Saint Eustatius ( Cobben 1960 ), Saint Vincent & the Grenadines ( Jaczewski 1930 ), Trinidad & Tobago ( Hynes 1948 ), United States of America ( Hungerford 1924 ).
